This year's program has 26 high-quality cars taking

highway. Da Nang City Police have just prosecuted
and detained Phan Cong Lich.  24 years old about
fraudulent property appropriation. This
is a super scammer targeting Shippers. With the
guise of exchanging foreign currency for tourists,
public fans admitted that they often go to
telegram, log in to
foreign currency exchange groups and approach tourists.  The most customers
are Russian customers. After agreeing on the
amount and face value, log in to
Da Nang shipper groups to find people to
transact with customers for a fee of
up to 300,000 VND. Shippers must
advance the money themselves to exchange foreign currency.  When the Shipper
delivers the money, the customer is required to transfer the
money through the bank account of the
foreign currency exchange service. The money
is always transferred through many different channels
before being transferred to the customer's account
in order to conceal the following crime.  When
receiving money, he cut off contact and did not
transfer money to pay for shipping. The victim
reported the crime to Da Nang police after being defrauded and
appropriated a large amount of money by
a group of 44 teenagers riding
motorbikes carrying weapons that caused chaos.

Iran [music] The Japanese government plans to
add a number of industries to the list of
accepting foreign workers  have a
type 1 specified skills visa in the
context that the country is facing a
labor shortage,
Kyodo news still sources from the
Japanese government saying that four fields will
be added including rail transport
forestry and wood industry, thereby increasing the total number of
industries allowed to receive foreign workers
under the above visa regime
to 16 industries, with foreign workers expected to
work in jobs such as driving
buses, driving taxis and trucks, and in  The
railway industry, including the production stages of Cao
Cao and working in g, will be considered for
visas with a stay of up to 5
years. The specified skilled labor program
was launched in 2019 in two
groups, type 1.  and type 2, type 1 applies
to foreign workers in some
fields who have passed the Japanese language test
and skill conditions with a maximum stay period
of 5 years, type 2 has more incentives
such as no limit  Limit the number of
visa extensions and allow workers to bring their
families to Japan. By the end of
November 2023, there are about 200,000
foreign workers issued with type 1 visas and
29 people with type

major quality improvements.  Iranian people
gathered in the city of Arakan and joined hands to
create the world's longest camel meat millet sandwich
according to
local authorities. This is an effort to promote
Iranian culinary culture as well as help
increase tourism.
The finished bread, 205 meters long
and 35 centimeters in diameter, is the work of
130 people. Organizers said they
recorded a documentary of the process of making
this bread and sent it to
Guinness.  To set a record after
completing the cake, it was shared with
tourists who came to cheer with us. We
hope everyone knows
this camel meat kebab
more. We hope camel meat
grilled and this type of bread will be
studied and popularized in more countries.
This activity is part of the
camel meat kebab festival held for the
first time within the framework of the cultural heritage festival of
adan city  The festival also brings many
other activities such as animal tours,
car exhibitions and cooking competitions.
Last weekend, the people of Henry village
of the Republic of Seville joined in the
bustling and colorful atmosphere of the festival.
This long-standing tradition aims to chase away
the cold of winter and welcome the
coming of Spring and has been recognized as a
world cultural heritage. The
sti festival begins with a
parade of white boys in the village in
costumes.  Unmarried men
will wear red masks. Married men will wear black
masks. They will visit each house and
if allowed by the homeowner, they will dance to
wish for a good harvest and
prosperity.  In return, the family will
receive money or gifts as the
procession approaches the house. Finally, they
will perform a horse-killing ritual that
symbolizes the end of the
sins of the old slave, followed by other activities.
Other entertainment dances and songs of the festival officially
begin. We greatly appreciate
this tradition because it helps villagers
meet each other after a long, busy year
through the procession of fun activities. The
str Thai festival has been  Unesco recognized it as
a good world cultural heritage

an American base  in Northeast Jordan was
